con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="admissionsApplicationService_V1" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:documentation>The following web service contract should be used to submit Admissions applications and applicants to UCL.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <schema targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <include schemaLocation="../registryws/xsd/admissionsApplicationsService_v1.xsd"/> </schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AdmissionsApplicationResponse_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:AdmissionsApplicationResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <wsdl:part element="v1_0:ExtendedFaultDtl" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplication_v1_0"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest_v1_0"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AdmissionsApplicationResponse_v1_0"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicant_v1_0"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest_v1_0"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0" type="tns:admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplication_v1_0"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <soap:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicant_v1_0"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0"> <soap:fault name="FaultDtlMsg_v1_0" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="admissionsApplicationsService_v1_0"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0" name="admissionsApplicationsServiceSoap11_v1_0"> <!--Note: Spring WS is configured to override the location attribute of the soap:address element during application deployment; that will reflect the name of the machine where the services run--> <soap:address location="http://swiss-t.adcom.ucl.ac.uk:3445/registryws/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0"> <!--SCHEMA INCLUDE SECTION--> <xs:include schemaLocation="registryData_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <!--REQUEST TYPES--> <element name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicationRequest"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="application" type="v1_0:applicationTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="applicant" type="v1_0:registrypersonTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <!--RESPONSE TYPES--> <element name="AdmissionsApplicationResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="reference" type="v1_0:referenceTp"></element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="ExtendedFaultDtl"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="faultDtl" type="uclBasic_v1_0:errorInfoTp"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <!--Reference # sent back from SITS--> <xs:complexType name="referenceTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="referenceID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="userCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo>v1.0: Common types to be used across services. v1.1: Added error info type. This type may be included to add detail to any SOAP Fault. v1.2: Added person type. v1.3: Renamed person type, made elements optional. v1.4: Added passportTp, employerTp, appointmentTp, languageTp, countryTp, domicileTp, nationalityTp, disabilityTp, ethnicityTp, professionalAssociationTp</xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <!--Name type--> <xs:complexType name="nameTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="surname" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="forename1" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="forename2" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="forename3" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="knownAs" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Gender Type--> <xs:simpleType name="genderTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Email Type--> <xs:simpleType name="emailTp"> <xs:union> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+(\.[A-Za-z0-9!#-'\*\+\-/=\?\^_`\{-~]+)*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value=""/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:union> </xs:simpleType> <!--UPI type--> <xs:simpleType name="upiTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="7"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Address type--> <xs:complexType name="addressTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine1" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine2" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine3" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine4" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine5" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="postCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="country" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Error information type code:- Generic error code for the user to interpret (e.g: 001, 002..) message:- Error message (e.g: Business validation failure message) referenceCode:- Application specific error messages that could be matched against errors thrown on the server side code(e.g:ERR123456) additionalInfo :- Stacktrace--> <xs:complexType name="errorInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="referenceCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="additionalInfo" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Basic Person type--> <xs:complexType name="personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="upi" type="uclBasic_v1_0:upiTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="mainUserID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="fullName" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="mainEmail" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sex" type="uclBasic_v1_0:genderTp"/> <xs:element default="false" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="exDirectory" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Passport--> <xs:complexType name="passportTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="issueDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="expiryDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="placeOfIssue" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Employer--> <xs:complexType name="employerTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Appointment--> <xs:complexType name="appointmentTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="employer" type="uclBasic_v1_0:employerTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="jobTitle" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="responsibilities" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Language: ISO codes for languages--> <xs:complexType name="languageTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Country: Only ISO codes allowed--> <xs:complexType name="countryTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--All types below may or may not have international or country specific codes, as a standard we allow only names. The service will be responsible to derive the codes are appropriate.--> <!--Domicile--> <xs:complexType name="domicileTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Nationality--> <xs:complexType name="nationalityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Disability--> <xs:complexType name="disabilityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Ethnicity--> <xs:complexType name="ethnicityTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Professional associations a person/entity could be associated with--> <xs:complexType name="professionalAssociationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="referenceNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="validFrom" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="validUntil" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="additionalDetails" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:regBasic_v1="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" xmlns:v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo>v1.0: First version released with types associated with student personal data, course information and related applications v1.1: Added types associated with information associated with a student's academic application when submitted to UCL</xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" schemaLocation="registryBasicTypes_v1.xsd"/> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--Decision Response Type--> <xs:complexType name="decisionResponseTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="decision" type="regBasic_v1:decisionCodesTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="decisionDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="studResponse" type="regBasic_v1:responseCodesTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="studResponseDt" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Admissions Decision and response type--> <xs:complexType name="admissionsdecRespTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--These elements correspond to the UCL decision and student response code against each of the 2 stages--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="stage1" type="v1_0:decisionResponseTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="stage2" type="v1_0:decisionResponseTp"/> <!--Final decision and response, the concatenation of decision and response codes--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="decResp" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Course Related Information--> <xs:complexType name="courseInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="graduateFlag" type="regBasic_v1:graduateFlagTp"/> <!--MS: Changed to affiliateFlag from affliateFlag--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="affiliateFlag" type="xs:boolean"/> <!--Student on an intercalated course Changed from intercalaterFlag to intercalater and changed datatype to regBasic_v1:intercalatedTp from Boolean--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="intercalater" type="regBasic_v1:intercalatedTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseBlockBeginDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseBlockEndDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="routeCode" type="xs:string"/> <!--e.g: BA European Social and Political Studies--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="routeName" type="xs:string"/> <!--e.g: Bachelor of Arts--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="awardName" type="xs:string"/> <!--Returners: A returning student would be a student who is on a continuation of their course at UCL--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="returner" type="xs:boolean"/> <!--Finalist: Students is on their final year of the course--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="finalist" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Course Enrolment Information--> <xs:complexType name="courseEnrolmentTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="courseBlock" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="expectedNxtBlock" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dateEnroled" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="yearEnroled" type="xs:gYear"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="enrolmentstatus" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Student Course Details--> <xs:complexType name="studentCourseTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ucasNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="applicantID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseInfo" type="v1_0:courseInfoTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="modeofAttendance" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="hesacourseStartDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseExpectedEndDt" type="xs:date"/> <!--This is the date student left college. Changed name from courseEndDt to studentTerminationDt--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="studentTerminationDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="courseEnrolmentDetails" type="v1_0:courseEnrolmentTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="studentPersonalDetailsTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="uclBasic_v1_0:personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="studentCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dob" type="xs:date"/> <!--Changed name from emails to studentEmailAccts studentPersonalDetailsTp will not hold a value for mainEmail for the base type--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="studentEmailAccts" type="regBasic_v1:studentEmailTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nationality" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="domicile" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="homeAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> <!--Changed name from contactAddress to emergency contact address--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="emergencyContactAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nextofKin" type="regBasic_v1:nextofKinTp"/> <!--Debtor flag against the student--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="debtFlag" type="xs:boolean"/> <!--Fee status--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="feeStatus" type="regBasic_v1:feeStatusTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="applicantDetailsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="entryMethod" type="regBasic_v1:entryMethodTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ucasNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="applicantID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="applicationFormNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="sequenceNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="entryYear" type="xs:gYear"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseInfo" type="v1_0:courseInfoTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="modeofAttendance" type="xs:string"/> <!--MS: Change type from string to decisionResponseTp--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="institutionResponse" type="v1_0:admissionsdecRespTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseAppCreateDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="courseAppBeginDt" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="clearingFlag" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="applicationStatus" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="studentInfoTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="personalDtls" type="v1_0:studentPersonalDetailsTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="currYearAcademicDtls" type="v1_0:studentCourseTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="applicantDtls" type="v1_0:applicantDetailsTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Source of Interest: Implies where have you heard about us question.--> <xs:complexType name="sourceOfInterestTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Qualification--> <xs:complexType name="qualificationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Qualifications in English language--> <xs:simpleType name="qualificationsinEnglishTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="IELTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="TOEFL"/> <xs:enumeration value="OTHER"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Language band score--> <xs:simpleType name="languageBandScoreTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OVERALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="READING"/> <xs:enumeration value="WRITING"/> <xs:enumeration value="SPEAKING"/> <xs:enumeration value="LISTENING"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--English language score--> <xs:complexType name="englishLanguageScoreTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Values allowed: READING, WRITING, SPEAKING, LISTENING and OVERALL--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="name" type="v1_0:languageBandScoreTp"/> <!--Actual score against the name--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="score" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--English Language Qualifications--> <xs:complexType name="englishLanguageTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--Values expected are : TOEFL, IELTS or OTHER--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="languageExam" type="v1_0:qualificationsinEnglishTp"/> <!--If the value in languageExam is OTHER then specify the name of the other English exam--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="otherLanguageExam" type="xs:string"/> <!--Internet or paper based etc--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="method" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dateTaken" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="languageScore" type="v1_0:englishLanguageScoreTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="additionalDetails" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Programme--> <xs:complexType name="programmeTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="modeOfAttendance" type="v1_0:modeofattendanceTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="programmeOccurrenceTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="v1_0:programmeTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="academicYear" type="xs:gYear"/> <!--Maps to blocks in SITS--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="academicYearOccurrence" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="block" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--Mode of attendance--> <xs:complexType name="modeofattendanceTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--HESA define mode of attendance codes--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Institution--> <xs:complexType name="institutionTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="country" type="uclBasic_v1_0:countryTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Referee--> <xs:complexType name="refereeTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="name" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="position" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="contactDetails" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Qualifications in progress or obtained--> <xs:complexType name="qualificationsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="institution" type="v1_0:institutionTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="qualification" type="v1_0:qualificationTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="grade" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="mainSubject" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="languageOfInstruction" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="fundingTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Self"/> <xs:enumeration value="Loan"/> <xs:enumeration value="Employer"/> <xs:enumeration value="Sponsorship"/> <xs:enumeration value="Other"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Course Application--> <xs:complexType name="courseApplicationTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--If the application source is an external system--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="externalApplicationID" type="xs:string"/> <!--UCL's application identifier--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="applicationID" type="xs:string"/> <!--Programme includes the programme and its occurrence. Both together identify the programme in SITS--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="programme" type="v1_0:programmeOccurrenceTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="startMonth" type="xs:gMonth"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="supervisorName" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="personalStatement" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="interviewAvailability" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="funding" type="v1_0:fundingTp"/> <!--If funding takes a value of Other then details about which other funding set against otherFunding--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="otherFunding" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="scholarship" type="v1_0:scholarshipTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sourcesOfInterest" type="v1_0:sourceOfInterestTp"/> <!--If sources of interest takes a value of Other then details about which other source of interest is set against otherSourceofInterest element--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="otherSourceofInterest" type="xs:string"/> <!--ATAS statement--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="atasStatement" type="xs:string"/> <!--IP address for the person who submitted the application--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ipAddress" type="xs:string"/> <!--Application creation date--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="creationDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <!--Application status--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="applicationStatus" type="xs:string"/> <!--TODO: Can be modelled as a seperate type for recommended decision and offer conditions to be met--> <!--Recommended decision: R=> Rejected C=> Conditional or any other--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="departmentalDecision" type="xs:string"/> <!--Recommended offer conditions--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="departmentalOfferConditions" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Scholarship or Studentship--> <xs:complexType name="scholarshipTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="awardName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="awardValue" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="awardDuration" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="awardStatus" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Applicant Type--> <xs:complexType name="registrypersonTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="uclBasic_v1_0:personTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="dateOfBirth" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nationality" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nationalityTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="secondaryNationality" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nationalityTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="countryOfDomicile" type="uclBasic_v1_0:domicileTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="countryOfBirth" type="uclBasic_v1_0:countryTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="passport" type="uclBasic_v1_0:passportTp"/> <xs:element default="false" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="visaRequired" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="disability" type="uclBasic_v1_0:disabilityTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ethnicity" type="uclBasic_v1_0:ethnicityTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="professionalAssoc" type="uclBasic_v1_0:professionalAssociationTp"/> <!--Changing the address types from v1_0:registryaddressTp to regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="homeAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="correspondenceAddress" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> <xs:element default="false" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="criminalConvictions" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="criminalConvictionDetails" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--Application Address Type--> <!--<xs:complexType name="registryaddressTp"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="uclBasic_v1_0:addressTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="homeTelephone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xs:element name="workTelephone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xs:element name="mobile" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xs:element name="fax" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xs:element name="email" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType>--> <!--Application--> <xs:complexType name="applicationTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"> <!--This is UCL's applicantion id--> <xs:element name="uclApplicationID" type="xs:string"/> <!--This is applicantion id for any external system Q: Will there be a need to store the name of the external system that sends UCL an application--> <xs:element name="externalApplicationID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:choice> <!--Name for source system which calls the service to send the application eg: 1) PRISM 2) UCL--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="source" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="applicant" type="v1_0:registrypersonTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="courseApplication" type="v1_0:courseApplicationTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="qualificationDetails" type="v1_0:qualificationsTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="englishLanguageQualification" type="v1_0:englishLanguageTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="employer" type="uclBasic_v1_0:appointmentTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="referee" type="v1_0:refereeTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION END *********************************************--> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:regBasic_v1="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/basictypes_v1" xmlns:uclBasic_v1_0="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/"> <!--v1.0: Common types moved from registryData_v1_0 to a separate XSD--> <xs:import namespace="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/uclbasic_v1_0/" schemaLocation="uclbasic_v1_0.xsd"/> <!--********************************************* SIMPLE TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--Graduate Level flag that indicates the level associated with the course. U = Under graduate course P = Post graduate course--> <xs:simpleType name="graduateFlagTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Entry method type U = UCAS applicants D = Direct applicants--> <xs:simpleType name="entryMethodTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Intercalater E = External intercalaters. Note:- These are students who come to UCL only for the intercalated course U = UCL intercalaters Note:- These are students who are study in UCL for the main degree as well the intercalated course--> <xs:simpleType name="intercalatedTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Fee Status H = Home O = Overseas--> <xs:simpleType name="feeStatusTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="O"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--UCL decision codes against a course application U => Unconditional R => Rejected C => Conditional--> <xs:simpleType name="decisionCodesTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--Student response codes against a course application I => Insurance D => Declined F => Firmly accepted--> <xs:simpleType name="responseCodesTp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--********************************************* SIMPLE TYPES SECTION END *********************************************--> <!--********************************************* COMPLEX TYPES SECTION START *********************************************--> <!--Student Email ids--> <xs:complexType name="studentEmailTp"> <xs:sequence> <!--MS:Changed type name from homeEmailID to personalEmailID--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="personalEmailID" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="institutionEmailID" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Contact Details that encapsulates Address and telephone numbers.--> <xs:complexType name="contactDtlsTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="addressDtls" type="uclBasic_v1_0:addressTp"/> <!--Can be used if a system does not distinguish betweeb different types of telephone numbers. They are stored just as contact numbers--> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="telephoneNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="email" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp"/> <!--Systems most time need to store the telephone details in exact fields and having a list of values of type string does not help in determining accurately where they need to be stored If we implement an order logic as 1st element is Home, 2nd is Work that may always work. Given that we cannot conclusively enumerate all the telephone types having individual elements is better--> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="landline" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="work" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="mobile" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="fax" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--Next of Kin Information--> <xs:complexType name="nextofKinTp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="relationship" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="name" type="uclBasic_v1_0:nameTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="address" type="regBasic_v1:contactDtlsTp"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="email" type="uclBasic_v1_0:emailTp"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:stud="http://ucl.ac.uk/isd/registry/studentrecordsdata_V1.0" <!--Optional:--> <ucl:upi>?</ucl:upi> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:mainUserID>?</ucl:mainUserID> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:fullName> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:title>?</ucl:title> <!--Optional:--> <stud:dateOfBirth>?</stud:dateOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <stud:nationality> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:nationality> <!--Optional:--> <stud:secondaryNationality> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:secondaryNationality> <!--Optional:--> <stud:countryOfDomicile> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:countryOfDomicile> <!--Optional:--> <stud:countryOfBirth> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:countryOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <stud:passport> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:number>?</ucl:number> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:issueDate>?</ucl:issueDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:expiryDate>?</ucl:expiryDate> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:placeOfIssue>?</ucl:placeOfIssue> </stud:passport> <!--Optional:--> <stud:visaRequired>false</stud:visaRequired> <!--Optional:--> <stud:disability> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:disability> <!--Optional:--> <stud:ethnicity> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:ethnicity> <!--Optional:--> <stud:professionalAssoc> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:referenceNo>?</ucl:referenceNo> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validFrom>?</ucl:validFrom> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:validUntil>?</ucl:validUntil> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:additionalDetails>?</ucl:additionalDetails> </stud:professionalAssoc> <stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine3>?</ucl:addressLine3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine4>?</ucl:addressLine4> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine5>?</ucl:addressLine5> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:postCode>?</ucl:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:country>?</ucl:country> </bas:addressDtls> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:telephoneNo>?</bas:telephoneNo> <!--Optional:--> <bas:email>?</bas:email> <!--Optional:--> <bas:landline>?</bas:landline> <!--Optional:--> <bas:work>?</bas:work> <!--Optional:--> <bas:mobile>?</bas:mobile> <!--Optional:--> <bas:fax>?</bas:fax> </stud:homeAddress> <!--Optional:--> <stud:correspondenceAddress> <!--Optional:--> <bas:addressDtls> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine1>?</ucl:addressLine1> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine2>?</ucl:addressLine2> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine3>?</ucl:addressLine3> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine4>?</ucl:addressLine4> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:addressLine5>?</ucl:addressLine5> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:postCode>?</ucl:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:country>?</ucl:country> </bas:addressDtls> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bas:telephoneNo>?</bas:telephoneNo> <!--Optional:--> <bas:email>?</bas:email> <!--Optional:--> <bas:landline>?</bas:landline> <!--Optional:--> <bas:work>?</bas:work> <!--Optional:--> <bas:mobile>?</bas:mobile> <!--Optional:--> <bas:fax>?</bas:fax> </stud:correspondenceAddress> <stud:criminalConvictions>false</stud:criminalConvictions> <!--Optional:--> <stud:criminalConvictionDetails>?</stud:criminalConvictionDetails> </stud:applicant> </stud:SubmitAdmissionsApplicantRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<stud:code>?</stud:code> <!--Optional:--> <stud:name>?</stud:name> <stud:country> <ucl:code>?</ucl:code> <!--Optional:--> <ucl:name>?</ucl:name> </stud:country> </stud:institution> <!--Optional:-->
